const.description: Const specifies that this field must be exactly the specified value

defined_only.description: DefinedOnly specifies that this field must be only one of the defined values for this enum, failing on any undefined value.

definedOnly.description: DefinedOnly specifies that this field must be only one of the defined values for this enum, failing on any undefined value.

in.description: In specifies that this field must be equal to one of the specified values

not_in.description: NotIn specifies that this field cannot be equal to one of the specified values

notIn.description: NotIn specifies that this field cannot be equal to one of the specified values

EnumRules.title: Enum Rules
EnumRules.description: EnumRules describe the constraints applied to enum values
